Sentencas: Electrochemical devices are central to sustainable energy storage and conversion.
Titulo: Revitalizing degraded solid oxide fuel cells in sour fuels for bifunctional oxygen catalysis in zinc-air batteries

Sentencas: Currently, most of the spent devices end up in landfills or the conventional toxic and energy-intensive metal extraction processes.
Titulo: Revitalizing degraded solid oxide fuel cells in sour fuels for bifunctional oxygen catalysis in zinc-air batteries

Sentencas: Advanced reuse and re-valorization practices are lacking due to both technical and economic barriers.
Titulo: Revitalizing degraded solid oxide fuel cells in sour fuels for bifunctional oxygen catalysis in zinc-air batteries

Sentencas: To address this growing concern, we herein demonstrate that the fully degraded electrode of the state-of-the-art anode-supported solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) can be revitalizedin situduring the operation.
Titulo: Revitalizing degraded solid oxide fuel cells in sour fuels for bifunctional oxygen catalysis in zinc-air batteries

Sentencas: The facile treatment involves fueling the SOFC with the readily available fuels containing H2S and the electrode pulverization.
Titulo: Revitalizing degraded solid oxide fuel cells in sour fuels for bifunctional oxygen catalysis in zinc-air batteries

Sentencas: The resulting powder comprises porous particles with mixed nickel sulfide nanoclusters dispersed on Y-stabilized ZrO2(NiSx/YSZ) which enables superior activity in both the oxygen reduction reaction (ORR) and oxygen evolution reaction (OER).
Titulo: Revitalizing degraded solid oxide fuel cells in sour fuels for bifunctional oxygen catalysis in zinc-air batteries

Sentencas: Its voltage gap between the ORR half-wave potential and OER potential at the benchmark 10 mA cm(-2)reached 0.74 V, rendering stable and efficient performance in a rechargeable Zn-air battery.
Titulo: Revitalizing degraded solid oxide fuel cells in sour fuels for bifunctional oxygen catalysis in zinc-air batteries

Sentencas: This work might boost the awareness of treating end-of-life electrochemical materials sustainably and pave new ways for the circular economy.
Titulo: Revitalizing degraded solid oxide fuel cells in sour fuels for bifunctional oxygen catalysis in zinc-air batteries
